# **Introduction**
This project shows how stock prices of the Big Five Tech companies changed from 1986 to 2020.

---

# **The Big Five Tech Companies**
- Apple (AAPL)
- Microsoft (MSFT)
- Amazon (AMZN)
- Alphabet (Google - GOOG)
- Meta (formerly Facebook - META)
